column1: Kata Robata////I met a friend for lunch here on a weekday during my lunch break.  Though I don't think speedy service is ideal for an upscale dinner (nicer to enjoy the company and food at a slightly slower pace)
column2: it is nicer to keep things moving during lunch when people have to get back to work.  As you can probably guess already
column3: this was some of the slowest service I've seen at a place for lunch.  Even though we were the first people in the restaurant when it opened at 11:30
column4: several parties (that were larger than ours) received their food well before us
column5: which ended up stretching the meal out for an hour plus.
